law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Garage" means any of the following, if operated for commercial purposes:
A parking place or establishment;
A vehicle storage facility; or
An establishment for the servicing, repair, or maintenance of vehicles.

section.section: "Lessor" means a person who regularly leases or offers to lease motor vehicles.

"Lessor" includes:
An assignee of leases; and
A person who during any 12-month period offers to lease 5 or more motor vehicles or who is assigned 5 or more leases.
